comment: Her criteria for papers and presentations is very unclear. She expects a lot out of so little time and space. Like expecting a complete summary of a country with political parties and major events in a single page, and will take off major points if you fall short which is sometimes unavoidable. Otherwise not too bad but I cant really recommend.

Mixed feelings about Amanda. Shes super nice and has interesting lectures. But her grading system is kind of wonky I think. Especially with the presentations. If you go over time (which is easy to do) she takes off serious points. Doesnt make it clear what she is looking for in those and will take off points there as well. Would take again though.

I have the utmost respect for Professor Guidero. She's a genuinely nice person and one of the only professors that I would consider a friend. Really good at getting information across and helping you if you need any help. More teachers should be like her.

Cares about her students and will talk to after class if you have any questions!!! Would highly recommend taking one her classes!!! She marks attendance and lots of opportunities to receive extra credit from articles or attending related school events!!

20% of your grade is attendance so make sure you show up. Your grade consists of a midterm, a final, 6 quizzes, and 2 easy essay assignments. She offers quite a bit of extra credit too. Very pleased with this course, would take her again.
